segments.text: I see a kitchen that seems to be stuck in its own rhythm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't notice the water pouring out of the sink, creating a little lake at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids, their eyes bright with mischief, daring each other to reach for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so high, teetering dangerously on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl's eager hand is raised, waiting for her prize, completely oblivious to the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s like a silent dance of chaos in the middle of this calm kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
